p: During the household visits, we collected 10 mL of blood from each participant and transported the samples on the same day, stored at 2°C–8°C, to our laboratory at the Instituto Gonçalo Moniz, Fundação Oswaldo Cruz, in Salvador. We centrifuged the samples to obtain serum, which we aliquoted and stored at −20°C until evaluation. We tested serum samples by using the IgG ELISA technique (Euroimmun, https://www.euroimmun.com) to detect specific CHIKV IgG.
